comment: An alternate definition of the union of two classes in terms of class difference, requiring no dummy variables. Along with ~ dfin2 and ~ dfss4 it shows we can express union, intersection, and subset directly in terms of the single "primitive" operation ` \ ` (class difference). (Contributed by NM, 10-Jun-2004.)
